00027 
00029 class CutPoints {
00030 public:
00031    CutPoints():m_topLeft( 0, 0 ), m_bottomRight( 0, 0 ) { }
00032    CutPoints( const MC2Point& topLeft, const MC2Point& bottomRight ):
00033       m_topLeft( topLeft ), m_bottomRight( bottomRight ) { }
00034    const MC2Point& getTopLeft() const { return m_topLeft; }
00035    const MC2Point& getBottomRight() const { return m_bottomRight; }
00036 
00038    uint32 getWidth() const {
00039       return getBottomRight().getX() - getTopLeft().getX();
00040    }
00041 
00043    uint32 getHeight() const {
00044       return getTopLeft().getY() - getBottomRight().getY();
00045    }
00046 
00047 private:
00048    MC2Point m_topLeft;
00049    MC2Point m_bottomRight;
00050 };
